version_description: We've added new content, improved performance and fixed some bugs.
Created a new feature called "Learn the Lyrics", restructured the song flow and added the ability to collect words and lyrics.
We've added new content and fixed some bugs.
Now you can collect gold or diamond discs!

¡Hola from the other side!
We've been hard at work in the Lirica studio, mixing and mastering the new version of the app!
Now there’s a profile where you collect vocab, there are song collections and previews, and grammar lessons within verses.
We also dressed up a little. Ready to receive our Grammar-y!
Fixed some pesky bugs, made it quicker to download songs.

iPad users - Lirica is now optimized for you! We’ve also smoothened the user experience and updated the Challenge design.
Questions/comments? Email hello@lirica.co.uk

We’ve exterminated some pesky bugs.

Follow us on YouTube, Instagram & Twitter @liricaapp for regular news, content and product releases.
Questions/comments? Email hello@lirica.co.uk

Complete a song’s grammar section in Learn to win a Grammar-y award!

We’ve exterminated some pesky bugs.

Follow us on YouTube, Instagram & Twitter @liricaapp for regular news, content and product releases.
Questions/comments? Email hello@lirica.co.uk
You can now share your favorite songs and your milestones with friends - challenge them to reach your level!
We’ve opened up all songs for you to try in Learn mode and exterminated some bugs!

We’ve gotten rid of some pesky bugs.

Follow us on YouTube, Instagram & Twitter @liricaapp for regular news, content and product releases. Questions/comments? Email hello@lirica.co.uk
We've launched a new language course for German!!
